General.Name: Panin Sekuritas Tbk
General.Description: PT Panin Sekuritas Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the provision of securities brokerage, underwriting, and investment management services in Indonesia. It is also involved in the provision of asset management services. The company was formerly known as PT. Nusamas Panin and changed its name to PT Panin Sekuritas Tbk in June 1995. PT Panin Sekuritas Tbk was founded in 1989 and is headquartered in Jakarta Selatan, Indonesia.
General.Address: Indonesia Stock Exchange Building, Jakarta Selatan, Indonesia, 12190
